original_text: Then Jacob said to his 12 sons, ‘I will soon die. You must take my dead body back to Canaan. Bury me there with my ancestors. Bury me in the cave in the field that belonged to Ephron the Hittite. Then Jacob said to his 12 sons, ‘I will soon die. You must take my dead body back to Canaan. Bury me there with my ancestors. Bury me in the cave in the field that belonged to Ephron the Hittite.
korean_text: 그가 그들에게 명하여 이르되 내가 내 조상들에게로 돌아가리니 나를 헷 사람 에브론의 밭에 있는 굴에 우리 선조와 함께 장사하라

sentences.original_text: Then Jacob said to his 12 sons
You must take my dead body back to Canaan
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나의 시체를 가나안으로 돌려보내야 한다

sentences.original_text: Bury me there with my ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에서 나를 나의 조상들과 함께 장사하라

sentences.original_text: Bury me in the cave in the field
that belonged to Ephron the Hittite
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 헷 사람 에브론에게 속한 것이었다

sentences.original_text: Then Jacob said to his 12 sons
You must take my dead body back to Canaan
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나의 시체를 가나안으로 돌려보내야 한다

sentences.korean_translation: 거기에서 나를 나의 조상들과 함께 장사하라

sentences.original_text: Bury me in the cave in the field
that belonged to Ephron the Hittite
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 헷 사람 에브론에게 속한 것이었다
